code: @Test public void testInsert() throws Exception {     MockEndpoint mock = getMockEndpoint("mock:result").     mock.expectedMessageCount(1).     Account account = new Account().     account.setId(444).     account.setFirstName("Willem").     account.setLastName("Jiang").     account.setEmailAddress("Faraway@gmail.com").     template.sendBody("direct:start", account).     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied().     // there should be 3 rows now     Integer rows = template.requestBody("mybatis:count?statementType=SelectOne", null, Integer.class).     assertEquals("There should be 3 rows", 3, rows.intValue()). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").to("mybatis-bean:AccountService:insertBeanAccount").to("mock:result").         }     }. }
